game.name: Survive Apocalypse
game.description: The Apocalypse has set on the city you live in. Aliens are attacking Earth, zombies have woken up an you only have your vehicle and a weapon to fight with and escape. Your only chance of survival is getting to the forest in time, where zombies and aliens are not interested in entering. Shoot every enemy on your way and be careful not to crash your car or get shoot at. Collect power ups to help you and upgrade your vehicle between levels. Have a lot of fun!
game.metaTitle: Survive Apocalypse, Car Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Survive Apocalypse at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Car games for best excitement and thrill in you!
